```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(janitor)
```

This is going to demonstrate {janitor} `clean_names()` function

```{r}

deaths <- read_excel("deaths.xlsx", skip = 4, n_max = 10)

deaths

deaths %>% 
  filter(`Has kids` == TRUE)

deaths <- deaths %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

deaths

deaths %>% 
  filter(has_kids == TRUE)

```
